bibl.title: Simonides Redivivus.
bibl.note: Tries to recover the sense of parts of five poems represented in: P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 (= Pack2 1750); LIX, 3965. - Poems on the Persian Wars: The Battle of Artemisium; The Battle of Plataea. - Sympotic Elegies: Lives, leaves; Spots on the ivory; The Happy Island. - Addendum.
bibl.seg: Tries to recover the sense of parts of five poems represented in: P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 (= Pack2 1750); LIX, 3965. - Poems on the Persian Wars: The Battle of Artemisium; The Battle of Plataea. - Sympotic Elegies: Lives, leaves; Spots on the ivory; The Happy Island. - Addendum.
